description: Phase 3 COMPLETE - All Tests Passing! Fixed all 32 failing tests from Phase 3 refactoring. Started: 1813 passing, 32 failing. Final: 1845 passing, 0 failing (+32 net improvement). Systematic approach: Updated extract_text_from_result() helpers in 12 test files to handle both TOON (.content) and JSON (.structured_content) modes. Fixed string assertions checking Debug output to properly validate structured_content fields (success, dry_run, truncated). Test categories fixed: find_logic (4), get_symbols (6), refactoring/editing (16), trace dogfooding (2), fuzzy_replace (1), integration (3). Core Phase 3 refactoring proven solid - eliminated 230 lines duplication, all 4 tools working correctly with shared create_toonable_result() helper. Ready to commit!
